info.title: Fanlink API
info.description:
API documentation of Rails Application.
Optional multiline or single-line Markdown-formatted description in [CommonMark](http://spec.commonmark.org/) or `HTML`.

tags.name: RoomMemberships

get.description: This is used to get a list of someone's followers or followed. If followed_id parameter is supplied, it will get the follower's of that user. If follower_id is supplied, it will get the people that person is following. If nothing is supplied it will get the people the current user is following.
get.summary: Get followers or followings of a user.

parameters.name: followed_id
parameters.description: Person to who's followers to get.

parameters.name: follower_id
parameters.description: Id of person who is following the people in the list we are getting.

patch.description: This updates a message in a room. Only the hidden field can be changed and only by an admin. If the item is hidden, Firebase will be updated to inform the app that the message has been hidden.

parameters.name: room_id
parameters.description: ID of the room the message belongs to.

hidden.description: Whether or not the item is hidden.

get.description: This is used to get a list of people.

parameters.name: username_filter
parameters.description: A username or username fragment to filter on.

parameters.name: email_filter
parameters.description: An email or email fragment to filter on.

post.description: This is used to create a new person.\nIf the account creation is successful, they will be logged in and we will send an onboarding email (if we have an email address for them).

email.description: Email address (required unless using FB auth token).

username.description: Username. This needs to be unique within product scope.

picture.description: Profile picture, this should be `image/gif`, `image/png`, or `image/jpeg`.

gender.description: Gender. Valid options: unspecified (default), male, female.

country_code.description: Alpha2 code (two letters) from ISO 3166 list.

post.description: This is used to initiate a password reset. Product and email or username required. If email or username is not found, password reset will fail silently.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Usually occurs when a field is invalid or missing.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Server threw an unrecoverable error. Create a ticket with any form fields you we're trying to send, the URL, API version number and any steps you took so that it can be replicated.

message.default: Reset password instructions have been sent to your email, if it exists in our system.

get.description: This is used to get a list of people flagged as "recommended". It excludes the current user and anyone the current user is following.
This is used to get a person.

patch.description: This is used to update a person. Anything not mentioned is left alone.

recommended.description: Whether this is a recommended persion. (Admin or product account only)

email.description: Email address (required unless using FB auth token).

username.description: Username. This needs to be unique within product scope.

picture.description: Profile picture, this should be `image/gif`, `image/png`, or `image/jpeg`.

gender.description: Gender. Valid options: unspecified (default), male, female.

country_code.description: Alpha2 code (two letters) from ISO 3166 list.

put.description: This is used to update a person. Anything not mentioned is left alone.

recommended.description: Whether this is a recommended persion. (Admin or product account only)

email.description: Email address (required unless using FB auth token).

username.description: Username. This needs to be unique within product scope.

picture.description: Profile picture, this should be `image/gif`, `image/png`, or `image/jpeg`.

gender.description: Gender. Valid options: unspecified (default), male, female.

country_code.description: Alpha2 code (two letters) from ISO 3166 list.

patch.description: This is used to change the logged in user's password.

get.description:
This gets a list of posts for a from date, to date, with an optional limit and person. Posts are returned newest first, and the limit is applied to that ordering.
    Posts included are posts from the passed in person or, if none, the current
    user along with those of the users the current user is following.
get.summary: Get posts for a date range.

parameters.name: person_id
parameters.description: The person whose posts to get. If not supplied, posts from current user plus those from people the current user is following will be returned.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: From date in format "YYYY-MM-DD". Note valid dates start from 2017-01-01.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: To date in format "YYYY-MM-DD". Note valid dates start from 2017-01-01.

404.description: Not Found. If the error says a route is missing, it usually means you forgot the ACCEPT header.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Server threw an unrecoverable error. Create a ticket with any form fields you we're trying to send, the URL, API version number and any steps you took so that it can be replicated.

post.description: This creates a post and puts in on the feed of the author's followers. It also sends a push notification to poster's followers if the notify_followers flag is set to true.

picture.description: Post picture, this should be `image/gif`, `image/png`, or `image/jpeg`.

global.description: Whether the post is global (seen by all users).

starts_at.description: When the post should start being visible (same format as in responses).

ends_at.description: When the post should stop being visible (same format as in responses).

repost_interval.description: How often this post should be republished.

recommended.description: Whether the post is recommended.(Admin or product account)

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Usually occurs when a field is invalid or missing.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Server threw an unrecoverable error. Create a ticket with any form fields you we're trying to send, the URL, API version number and any steps you took so that it can be replicated.

get.description: This gets a list of posts with optional filters and pagination.
get.summary: Get a list of posts (ADMIN ONLY).

parameters.name: id_filter
parameters.description: Full match on post.id. Will return either a one element array or an empty array.

parameters.name: person_filter
parameters.description: Full or partial match on person username or email.

parameters.name: body_filter
parameters.description: Full or partial match on post body.

parameters.name: posted_after_filter
parameters.description: Posted at or after timestamp. Format: "2018-01-08T12:13:42Z"

parameters.name: posted_before_filter
parameters.description: Posted at or before timestamp. Format: "2018-01-08T12:13:42Z"

parameters.name: status_filter
parameters.description: Post status. Valid values: pending published deleted rejected errored

patch.description: This is used to accept, deny or unfriend a relationship (friend request).

status.description: New status. Valid values are "friended", "denied" or "withdrawn". However each one is only valid in the state and/or from the person that you would expect (e.g. the relationship requester cannot update with "friended").

put.description: This is used to accept, deny or unfriend a relationship (friend request).

status.description: New status. Valid values are "friended", "denied" or "withdrawn". However each one is only valid in the state and/or from the person that you would expect (e.g. the relationship requester cannot update with "friended").

404.description: Not Found. The database doesn't contain a record for that id. If the error says a route is missing, it usually means you forgot the ACCEPT header.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Usually occurs when a field is invalid or missing.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Server threw an unrecoverable error. Create a ticket with any form fields you we're trying to send, the URL, API version number and any steps you took so that it can be replicated.

get.description: This gets a list of active rooms (public or private, as specified by the "private" parameter).

parameters.name: private
parameters.description: Which type of room you want. With true you will get just active private rooms of which the current user is a member. With false (the default), you will get just all active public rooms.

post.description: The creates a private room and makes it active.

name.description: The name of the room. Must be between 3 and 26 characters, inclusive.

ids.description: Ids of persons to add as members. Users who are blocked by or who are blocking the current user will be silently excluded. You do not need to include the current user, who will be made a member automatically.

post.description: This reports a message that was posted to a public room.
post.summary: Report a message in a public room.

parameters.name: room_id
parameters.description: Id of the room in which the message was created.

message_id.description: The id of the message being reported.

reason.description: The reason given by the user for reporting the message.

get.description: This gets a list of message for a from date, to date, with an optional limit. Messages are returned newest first, and the limit is applied to that ordering.

parameters.name: room_id
parameters.description: ID of the room the messages belongs to.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: From date in format "YYYY-MM-DD". Note valid dates start from 2017-01-01.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: To date in format "YYYY-MM-DD". Note valid dates start from 2017-01-01.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to count of limit.

get.description: This is used to see if your current session is valid. We return the currently logged-in person if the session is still good and a 404 otherwise.

post.description: This is used to log someone in.

product.description: Internal name of product logging into.

email_or_username.description: The person's email address or username. Required unless using Facebook ID.

facebook_auth_token.description: The facebook auth token. Required unless using username/password.

password.description: The person's password. Required unless using facebook_auth_token.

keep.description: NOT YET SUPPORTED. True if you want to keep them signed in, otherwise this will be a non-persistent session.

delete.description: This is used to log someone out.
